```py
>>> # tall matrices no wrap
>>> a = np.zeros((5, 3), int)
>>> np.fill_diagonal(a, 4)
>>> a
array([[4, 0, 0],
 [0, 4, 0],
 [0, 0, 4],
 [0, 0, 0],
 [0, 0, 0]]) 
```

```py
>>> # tall matrices wrap
>>> a = np.zeros((5, 3), int)
>>> np.fill_diagonal(a, 4, wrap=True)
>>> a
array([[4, 0, 0],
 [0, 4, 0],
 [0, 0, 4],
 [0, 0, 0],
 [4, 0, 0]]) 
```

```py
>>> # wide matrices
>>> a = np.zeros((3, 5), int)
>>> np.fill_diagonal(a, 4, wrap=True)
>>> a
array([[4, 0, 0, 0, 0],
 [0, 4, 0, 0, 0],
 [0, 0, 4, 0, 0]]) 
```

```py
>>> a = np.zeros((3, 3), int);
>>> np.fill_diagonal(np.fliplr(a), [1,2,3])  # Horizontal flip
>>> a
array([[0, 0, 1],
 [0, 2, 0],
 [3, 0, 0]])
>>> np.fill_diagonal(np.flipud(a), [1,2,3])  # Vertical flip
>>> a
array([[0, 0, 3],
 [0, 2, 0],
 [1, 0, 0]]) 
```
